# TIC3 Air - Ground/Air/Ground (G/A/G) System Upgrade
## Request for Proposal (RFP) - Competitive Solicitation
### Reference Number: [PW-QC-028-29137](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2023/08/04/df3a2ed3f45680ceff9b435a8d2b8a3d/attachments.zip)

#### Solicitation Overview
The Public Works and Government Services Canada (PWGSC) invites all interested suppliers to submit a bid for the TIC3 Air - Ground/Air/Ground (G/A/G) System Upgrade. The project aims to modernize the current Royal Canadian Air Force (RCAF) voice, data, and video communication infrastructure.

#### Key Requirements
The Department of National Defence (DND) has an acquisition requirement to:

1. Replace existing Air Traffic Management (ATM) Ground/Air/Ground (G/A/G) radios with modern, IP-based reliable ATM G/A/G radios, including applicable ancillaries and accessories.
2. Replace existing Canadian Air Defence Radio System (CADRS) G/A/G radios with modern, reliable, IP-based Air Defence (AD) G/A/G radios, including applicable ancillaries and accessories.

#### Project Scope
The acquisition includes system testing, installation, and commissioning support for the system upgrade, as well as extended warranty coverages. The delivery date is as mentioned in the RFP.

#### Important Notice
The Crown retains the right to negotiate with suppliers on any procurement. Documents may be submitted in either official language of Canada.

#### Attachment
A detailed RFP package, including all relevant documents, is available on the Canada Buy Services website.

## Key Dates
* Solicitation closing date: October 27, 2023, at 15:00:00 (EDT)
* Amendment Date: October 20, 2023
* Expected Contract Start Date: None (TBD)

### Contracting Entity Information
Government of Canada
Public Works and Government Services Canada
11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage
Gatineau, Quebec (K1A 0S5)
Contact Person: Oscar Garate - [oscar.garate@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:oscar.garate@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)

## Trade Agreements
* Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* Comprehensive
